embeds.title: Reformation
embeds.description:
Rare Power / 1 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss

Whenever you **Absorb** a Slime, gain 1 **Strength:p_strength:** ( and 1 **Dexterity:p_dexterity:**).

messages.content: remember kunai?
yea
I don't think I've used this card much so I'm interested what people think 🍿
more important upgrade than wraith form
like 80% of the power is in the dex
ok maybe not more important but more impactful
Yeah the upgrade is pretty vital, you already get strength from absorbing, so getting an extra strength isn't too massive.
Whereas does slime boss have any other dex? I think <grow slime boss>

embeds.title: Grow
embeds.description:
Uncommon Power / 2 (1) :e_slime: / The Slime Boss

Lose 1 Slime slot in exchange for 2 **Strength:p_strength:** and 2 **Dexterity:p_dexterity:**.

messages.content: <? slime boss dexterity>

embeds.title: Searched for "slime boss dexterity"
embeds.description:
1: slime boss card **Reformation** - 79% sure
2: slime boss card **Grow** - 79% sure
3:  creature **Time Eater** - 37% sure
4: slime boss card **Overexert** - 35% sure
5: slime boss card **Goop Armor** - 34% sure
6:  relic **Slimy Skull** - 34% sure
7:  relic **Goop Dweller** - 34% sure
8: slime boss card **Just Desserts** - 33% sure
9: slime boss card **Slime Tap** - 33% sure
10: slime boss card **Minion Master** - 32% sure

messages.content: nope
dex is just an insane thing to have and it should be really difficult to come by
even footwork is maybe more than it should be

this card has one of the best upgrades of all time. Without the upgrade the card is fine, but with that upgrade this card becomes a super powerful scaling card you can base your whole deck around; using renewable sources of slime generation to make lots of dex and strength and it just gets better if you find more reformation. Some of my very best slime boss runs were all built of this card
doesn't slime boss have only 1 renewable slime source, being a rare card?
also it single-handedly makes card that have the text "absorb slimes" great when they are otherwise kind of medicore
lol
u have no idea how many split cards u can stuff into a deck with no repercussions
I know, but for non-exhausting cards
i think the basic split card might become non exhausting semi soon
Yeah I remember hearing people discussing that
greed ooze and scrap ooze are events that give you infinitely reusable slimes. Then there is duplicate. Plus you can just stuff your deck with a million slime spawn cards and its still really good
don't the event oozes cost 2
is it possible to get both event oozes?
they cost two, but have retain so you can play then when you can afford it (easy to do with prepare) and you have slime trap to play them for free once and draw 2 cards.
<prepare>

embeds.title: Prepare
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 2 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss

Gain 10 (15) **Block:p_block:**.
Next turn, gain **:e_slime:** and draw 2 cards.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: did this get nerfed recently?
i swear it used to give 2 energy
other than rarity
finally there is <slime brawl> which can play your whole deck for you in reformation based strategy after a few turns

embeds.title: Slime Brawl
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 3 (2) :e_slime: / The Slime Boss

Play the top card of your draw pile. Repeat for each of your spawned Slimes.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: slime brawls text is misleading; it means slime spawned throughout the entire battle.
so with reformation you can play the top 10 cards of your deck pretty easily with this and if those cards create slimes then thats even more dex and strength for you.
i dont think thats true??
:awaken: if true
:beta_hexaghost: if not
its not true
tbh I think it was a bug, they might of fixed it in a recent patch
oh well rip that strategy then (still a good card)
well then another good to pair with reformation that is not broken is <Mass Repurpose> upgrading your slimes and giving tons of stats for just one energy

embeds.title: Mass Repurpose
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 1 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss

**Absorb** ALL Slimes. Split into a random **Specialist** for each.  ( **Command** them. )
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: rare card combos be like
so ya reformation, good card
slime boss doesnt have any weak rare cards, its pretty lucky
just situational ones
all of them tend to focus on just 1 aspect - slimes, goop, or licks
so if you're not using one of them, i find you can whiff on rares at times
slime boss decks can typically use 2 of the character's core strategies at once though, so you often get to take rare cards.

like a reformation deck can use tackle synergies pretty well, combo tackle being useful to generate a bunch of attacks to use your strength with (and the dex making it much easier to block the tackles damage)

acutally i'll do one more reformation synergy. <grow> acutally works pretty well here, because having less slime slots makes it easier to spam absorb your slimes. If you can play 2 grow and have only one slime slot you can gain stats super fast (although it comes at the cost of making cards like mass repurpose worse so use with care)

embeds.title: Grow
embeds.description:
Uncommon Power / 2 (1) :e_slime: / The Slime Boss

Lose 1 Slime slot in exchange for 2 **Strength:p_strength:** and 2 **Dexterity:p_dexterity:**.

messages.content: speeds up your scaling two ways, nice
well
a splitting card is the same as losing a slime slot
and costs less energy
and u dont lose the absorb all slimes synergies
fair enough
<i~reformation>
i was half expecting a reference to martin luther
Multiple relics technically
what relic can repeatedly spawn slimes?!?!?
Well the 2 that we're mentioned above but it's already been discussed
I admit that comment was rushed
But yeah good card absorbing slimes is extremely easy and is a conduit for your strongest cards
<spawn slime relic>

embeds.title: Greed Ooze
embeds.description:
Special Relic / The Slime Boss

At the start of combat, spawn Greed Ooze.
At Rest Sites, Greed Ooze will take 50 of your souls:p_gold:, increasing its damage by 1.
When Greed Ooze is absorbed gain Revive Greed.
Revive Greed (2 (1) **:e_slime:** ): **Retain**. Split into Greed Ooze. **Exhaust**.
*A friend found in the Spire who devours souls.*

messages.content: Oh wait nevermind I'm dumb...
<scrap ooze>

embeds.title: Scrap Ooze
embeds.description:
Special Relic / The Slime Boss

At the start of combat, spawn Scrap Ooze (can be revived if Absorbed).
At Rest Sites, you can donate a card to the Scrap Ooze, modifying its damage:
+1 damage for Uncommons
+2 damage for Rares
-1 damage for Commons
-2 damage for **Curse**s
**

messages.content: Can't wait for the scrap ooze discussion (this relic is broken)
It's basically just a better <peace pipe>

embeds.title: Peace Pipe
embeds.description:
Rare Relic / All

You can now remove cards from your deck at Rest Sites.
*Clears the mind and cleanses the soul.*

messages.content: <Reformation> reworked:

embeds.title: Reformation
embeds.description:
Common Skill / 1 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Gain 8 (11) **Block** :p_block:.
Put a card from your discard pile on top of the draw pile.

messages.content: Pinned a message.
This is a fair rework. Slime Boss already has inherent strength gain in slime builds. This felt a bit much, even to *me*. So this change seems pretty cool.
Yeah I like the new version more, just worried it may make <just desserts> easier to access

embeds.title: Just Desserts
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 1 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Deal 5 (8) damage to ALL enemies.
**Exhume** 2 random "Lick" cards.

messages.content: I still think just desserts will be strong, but not as all-encompassing as before.
Slime didn't had any deck manipulation before (well they had the **<Replication>** but you also wanted to draw it with specific cards), so it will probably will feel pretty good to use.

embeds.title: Replication
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 1 (0) :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Choose a card.
Put a copy on top of your draw pile.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: I'll happily take block headbutt as a common
Yeah, it is very easy to take, especially since Slime usually struggles with getting enough **Block**.
Especially after this update lol

Blocking and setting up a card for next turn go really nicely together. The added card selection should be a very welcome addition to slime bosses kit. For the record, I really liked the old reformation, especially when upgraded, but I can admit that it got very out of hand with the right builds, and would also be too strong alongside the split rework
